content.rendered:
About us

Strategic consultants, experts in accelerating change for business and individuals.

23+

Years of Experience

Tax Consultants in Bangalore

Who we are

We are the magic behind the company’s best days.

TaxCure Consultancy LLP, Bangalore's leading tax firm since 2001, delivers expert financial solutions with integrity, innovation, and compliance-focused strategies.

Our Mission is to reach services to the doorstep of the customer, so that to bring the knowledge of statutory compliance to the grass root level.

We have around 5000 plus clients and 30 people team to cater their needs.

4.7
Client Ratings
Get Consultation

Gururaj Associates goal

  • Our goal is to ease the business processes and enhance the productivity of business enterprises by providing consultancy services with appropriate technology and value for money.
  • As few steps towards fulfilling that mission, Our Team developed a new approach to automate the system and it quickly spread to the nee-dies around the country.
  • We are now widely recognized as the India’s best GST registration and filing solution provider, Income tax return filing consultants and Service Tax consultants. We also help you getting a new Pan Card.
  • We help startup business people for their business registration of Proprietorship, Partnership firm and Private Limited Companies and consulting services with easy to use technologies and concepts.
  • All these services are available at your doorstep.
  • When you visit Our website, you’ll be able to find information about the company, its history, services offered, support and respectful clientele.
  • Our presence is in almost all the segments of industry. This is mainly because of the flexibility in providing solutions to suit the requirement.
  • Our services and ease to use have made it one of the country’s best known brands through word of mouth from our satisfied customers.
  • Thousands of loan consultants, Insurance Agents, Placement Consultants, advocates network marketers etc., use our services such as Income Tax filing services, eTDS, GST registration and filing, service tax registration and filing and much more by referring there customers and they believe our solutions are one of the best reliable of its kind. In addition, thousands of customers, partners and associates keep continuously providing feedback, suggestions and updates.

The largest truly global wealth manager

Integrity

Doing the right things, in an independent, confidential, fair and ethical manner

Excellence

We continually improve through listening, learning and innovation

Expert Knowledge

Develop analytical and practical expertise in domain.

Transparency

Working together with other professionals globally to achieve client's goals

Are you having any problems but can't consult to anyone?

Talk to us! We promise we can help you!
Call Now : +91 95353 49494
Testimonial

Client Feedback & Reviews

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Jagadeesh G 
 
2022-09-15
 
 
  
Thank you for updating address. Kindly change photos of Old office photos also
  
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Lokesh Loki 
 
2022-07-27
 
 
  
Best sarvis in VAT &Adite
Friendly people... Very very good sarvis
  
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Lipi Mishra 
 
2018-06-13
 
 
  
As per me , this is the best VAT registration and filing solution provider, and Service Tax consultants and all these services are available at doorstep. Whats more anybody can ask for? Simply its superb!!!
  
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Ram Venkatesh 
 
2017-08-03
 
 
  
Quick service provider Auditor.  Friendly people
  
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Google rating score: 4.3 of 5, based on 12 reviews
4.7+
2,471 Reviews
Execellent Score
All Reviews
